name: InFiNiTe Loop Scarf in CREAM by SwaK
description:
This original design is from my Signature Collection. My Signature collection is comprised of designs that are the "spirit" of the SWAK vision. I design these pieces to be very Bold and Dramatic--Beautiful colors--and very Fashion Forward.

The InFiNiTe LooP is handmade from a very soft LambsWool blend. Numerous chains have been connected together and balls have been interjected to build this piece. This piece is featured in a Beautiful CREAM color. 

Other color choices:
Black, Deep Purple, Oatmeal, Cream, Charcoal Gray, Denim Blue, Cranberry Red

This Oversized Cowl/Scarf/Neckwarmer offers Warmth, Versatility, and can be styled to achieve several Chic looks. 

Care:
Machine Washable Delicate, Cold. Fluff Dry Low Heat

Dimensions: 72 inches(182.88 cm) in circumference

*I produce your item by hand and ship within 5 business days of purchase. 

Thanks for shopping, 
Amina
Contact: swakshop@live.com
Text questions to 404-545-3844

name: SWAK's Sun Ray PassThru Scarf Neckwarmer Wrap in Winter White Cream
description:
The Sun Ray Pass-Thru Scarf Wrap is from my Chunky Chic Collection and is featured in Winter White Cream. This chunky and luxuriously soft Scarf Wrap is made from a super soft and thick nylon and wool blended yarn from Turkey. Extremely plush and warm--it envelops you in warmth and softness. 

The inspiration for this Scarf is the Sun. Sun Ray Bursts have been designed into the oblong tips of the scarf wrap. Totally chic and elegant, this scarf wrap is also designed with a Pass-Thru opening on one end to allow you to wear it in an ascot style, neckwarmer or cowl. 

The beautiful Winter White Cream color of this scarf is classic sophistication and will beautifully compliment any ensemble. 

Measurements: 
BODY: 40 inches Long (101.60 cm)
7.5 inches in Height (19.05 cm)

Care: Machine Wash Delicate, Fluff Dry or Hand Wash Cold/Warm, Fluff Dry

I can make this scarf in a variety of color combinations. If you would like a specific color other than the one featured here, please convo me and I will gladly accommodate your request.

**I have a few of the Winter White Cream in stock now, will ship next business day after your checkout date.

Thanks for Shopping,
Amina
Full collection, visit www.swakdesigns.etsy.com
Contact: swakshop@live.com
Text questions to 404-545-3844

name: SWAK's Oversized Ribbed Warmer in Red Clay and Moss Green mix
description:
SWAK's Oversized ribbed Neckwarmer is handmade from a wonderful Lambsool blend from Turkey--super soft and not itchy at all! This ribbed Neckwarmer is double thick and extra warm. I designed it in a wide design in a large circular style. The ribbed texture will help keep the chilly air out and give you a great stretch for styling various looks.

This piece is featured in Moss & Red Clay mix, but I will offer several colors in this design. Convo me if you have a specific color that you would like me to make yours in. I welcome custom orders. 

Care: Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle. Roll with Towel to squeeze any excess water. Lay flat to dry or Fluff Heat.

Dimensions: 60 inches (152.4 cm) circumference

*** I have a few of these in stock now, Ready to ship!!

Thanks for shopping!
Amina

Full Collection, visit www.swakdesigns.etsy.com
contact: swakshop@live.com

name: SWAK's BALL, CHAINS, and FREEDOM Cowl neckwarmer in GRAY TWEED
description:
This Cowl Scarf will keep you very warm and cozy. Handmade from a soft wool blend, it has been designed to mimic chains, which are interlocked with 15 crocheted balls. Deep black accent strings, which represent wings of freedom, have been artistically tied to the chains of the neck Cowl.

The main color of this neck cowl, is a gray tweed-- a light gray base that contains flecks of black, tan and cream. It is neutral in color and can be paired with almost any color in your wardrobe. Four Italian Iron Disc buttons secure the neck Cowl with loops on the other end.

*** I have a few of these in stock now, Ready to ship, will ship next business day after your checkout date.

This design has become one of my top sellers-- be suret o check out my customer feedback about this item and my other designs!

Dimensions: Approx. 20-21" Long/Circumference (has stretch)
This cowl unbuttons OR can be slipped over the head. 

Thanks for Shopping!
Amina
View all my designs at: www.swakdesigns.etsy.com

name: SWAK's Post Architectural HAT in Natural..Cotton Viscose
description:
handcrocheted this Oversized Brimmed Architectural Hat with a high quality Cotton Viscose and designed it with lots of texture and thickness to add warmth and quality to this piece. 
It is double-stranded throughout with 4 posts that extend from the top of the hat to the brim-this makes it very thick and sturdy. I designed an additional circular post around the crown for added texture and dimension--which gives the hat an overall structured and architectural look.

It is oversized and has a little slouch in the back, so it's great to wear with your hair tucked inside and also looks great with your hair out. This is a durable hat that will last and keep you nice and warm, while you look fabulously chic with its unique style. 

It is featured in Natural but there are so many color choices available (the most popular are listed below), I can make in almost any color. Convo me if you have a particular color that you would like. I will feature additional colors, throughout the week.

COLOR CHOICES:
Cream, Wheat, Oatmeal tweed, Cafe au lait, Pink sugar, Deep raspberry, Coral, Pumpkin, Butterscotch, Pear, Olive, Fig, Chocolate, Midnight Black, Charcoal, Fog Gray, Red Lipstick, Navy, and Army

Dimensions: fits an average teen or adult head size of 20-24 inches, has lots of stretch.

This item is handmade and shipped within 5 business days after payment is received. Please notify if expedited shipping is desired. 

Thanks for Shopping!
Amina
To shop my entire collection, go to:
